LanguageData.TargetLegsFactor: Force only damage legs and sub-parts: {0}% of the times.
LanguageData.TargetLegsTooltip: Note that the traps give damage 5 times at single spring. So, this possibility will be checked 5 times for each trap spring.
LanguageData.DamScaleTooltip: A multiplier, applied on the pre-defined damage value of traps. Default is 100 percent.
LanguageData.APScaleTooltip: A multiplier, applied on the pre-defined AP value of the trap. Default is 0.015. Final value is multiplied by the total trap damage.
LanguageData.StoneFactorTooltip: A multiplier to be able to capture victims less-lethally. Beware that it will be affected by the previous damage multiplier also.
LanguageData.StoneCaptureAnimalChance: Stone Traps Capture Wild Animals Chance: {0}%
LanguageData.StoneCaptureAnimalTooltip: An extra feature for stone traps to passively hunt wild animals.
LanguageData.StoneImmobilizeTooltip: Applies a non-lethal immobilizing hediff to all trapped pawns, if their limbs are not amputated, yet.
LanguageData.HediffTimerTooltip: Approximate time for victims to free their legs. Note that the immobilization will end if the captured pawn is moved from the trap position.
